Articles.Content:
I did a search, but since the term "Launch pad" is so ambiguous, I received hundreds of results. I was looking to add some larger and cooler looking launch structures for my launch pad release systems. I have no problem taking the time to do so, but is it possible to have them readily attachable to a craft I build afterward?

Like a subassembly, but I'm not sure it that will work exceptionally well from my experiences in the VAB

Any help is appreciated.

Have you looked at any of Mulibin's work? I am fairly sure you will find something there since he has done almost everything. Here is a link, again not my work, hope this helps.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/41575-Apogee-Ship-Works-Formerly-Mulbin-s-Ships-Replica-real-world-craft

Edited March 30, 2014 by Jeb Cubed

hey buddy, i'm working currently on a stock launchclamp and tower system for my soyuzrockets. take a look in my signature to get there.

pro: awesome looking and real function

con: high partcount.

maybe this can give your ideas

(original idea by sgt_flyer)
